examples.korean: An was quoted as saying 'I have ventured to commit a serious crime, offering my life for my country.' 듣기 Add to Wordbook 안중근은 '나는 중대한 범죄를 저지르는 것을 무릅쓰고, 나라를 위해서 내 목숨을 바친다.' Neungyule
